short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An Chrome Extension to open links faster by hovering over them and prerendering the content

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Open links faster by hovering over them and prerendering the content.

This function works only on links to same domains.
